title: Shifting Inductive Bias with Success-Story Algorithm, Adaptive Levin Search, and Incremental Self-Improvement

tldr.text: In inductive transfer case studies, task sequences that allow for speeding up the learner's average reward intake through appropriate shifts of inductive bias are studied through the use of the “success-story algorithm” (SSA).
